news.title: Rainbow Six Siege Freeze For All Permafrost Event Live Now
news.description: Dive into an updated, fast-paced free-for-all winter event in the Arctic Workshop. Collect Frozen Souls for bonus points; plus, unlock two free bundles and collection packs.

news.title: Riders Republic Year 4 Season 13 Out Now
news.description: From new Mass Races, snowy live events, and a new Season Pass, you won’t want to miss this Winter Season.

news.title: Get Your First Month of Ubisoft+ Classics for $1
news.description: Play beloved games like Assassin’s Creed Valhalla, Far Cry 6, and Rainbow Six Siege with your subscription.

news.title: Play Games and Win Rewards in the Ubisoft Winter Challenge 2024
news.description: Sign up and contribute to community challenges to get 100 Ubisoft Units, in-game rewards, and a chance to win a Ubisoft+ Premium subscription.

news.title: Play Games and Win Rewards in the Ubisoft Winter Challenge 2024
news.description: Sign up and contribute to community challenges to get 100 Ubisoft Units, in -game rewards, and a chance to win a Ubisoft + Premium subscription.

news.title: Get Rewards and Discounts with Ubisoft Units
news.description: Everything you need to know about Ubisoft Units, from how to get them to how to redeem them for discounts on games and exclusive in-game rewards.

news.title: For Honor Year 8 Season 4, The Serpent Sword, Begins December 5
news.description: An uneasy in-game alliance brings a new Hero skin, the return of the 2v2 Ice Brawlers game mode, a holiday event, and more.

news.title: Brawlhalla Star Wars Event Wave II
news.description: Characters including Han Solo, Chewbacca, Kay Vess and Nix, and The Mandalorian with Grogu have joined the free-to-play fighting game, bringing a themed Map and Items with them.

news.title: Ubisoft Discontinues Development on XDefiant
news.description: As of today, new downloads, player registrations and purchases will no longer be available.

news.title: XDefiant: A Message to Our Community
news.description: A message to the XDefiant community from Executive Producer Mark Rubin.

news.title: Ubisoft+ Revamps Reward System
news.description: In addition to day-one access for new games and a library of classic favorites, players can now choose their monthly rewards in-game.

news.title: Wishlist Anno 117 on Steam Now; Anno 1800 Final Content Update Out December 5
news.description: It’s the End of an Era for one empire, but another will soon be ready to begin. Celebrate Anno 1800’s final content update with the Creative Festival, and wishlist the upcoming Anno 117: Pax Romana on Steam today.

news.title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora’s Second Story Pack, Secrets of the Spires, Available Now
news.description: PS5 Pro players can also enjoy an update that enhances visual quality and performance.

news.title: Assassin’s Creed Syndicate – Build an Underworld Empire in Victorian London with Ubisoft+
news.description: Recruit your own street gang and liberate the city from Templar industrialists as Jacob and Evie Frye in the most modern-set Assassin’s Creed to date.

news.title: The Rogue Prince of Persia's The Second Act Update Out Now
news.description: The Prince isn't purple anymore, and that's just the beginning. Here's everything you need to know about the game's biggest update to date, including new bosses, biomes, and more.

news.title: Star Wars Outlaws™ Now Available on Steam, Wild Card Story Pack Out Now
news.description: Jump into the open-world action-adventure on Steam and continue Kay Vess’ journey with the first story pack, Wild Card

news.title: Star Wars Outlaws™ Accessibility Spotlight
news.description: The development team provides a first look at their approach to accessibility including audio descriptions, assist features, and more.

news.title: Just Dance Celebrates 15th Anniversary
news.description: Take a look back at the history of the best-selling music videogame franchise of all time.

news.title: Skull and Bones Season 4: Shadows of the Deep Out Today
news.description: Vikram Rajan is invading the Indian Ocean with his ghostly fleet. Plus, get a new ship, new weapons, and new world events.

news.title: Black Friday Deals at the Ubisoft Store
news.description: Save big on games like Star Wars Outlaws, Assassin’s Creed Valhalla, Anno 1800, and more now through December 3.

news.title: Everything Revealed at Brawlhalla’s World Championship Event, BCX 2024
news.description: Brawlhalla’s annual world championship event in Atlanta teased an upcoming Star Wars event, new in-game features, a new graphic novel, and more.

news.title: Assassin’s Creed Syndicate 60 FPS Console Patch Out Now
news.description: Experience Victorian London as Jacob and Evie Frye at double the framerate on PS5, PS5 Pro, and Xbox Series X|S.

news.title: Rainbow Six Siege – Operation Collision Point Operator Remaster and Balancing Guide
news.description: Blackbeard gets a new shield with soft-breach capability and rappel coverage in addition to balancing updates for Sens, Ying, and ballistic shields. Plus, console and PC crossplay, and more!

news.title: Mythic Quest Season 4 Premieres January 29 on Apple TV+
news.description: The highly anticipated season will follow the newly reunited Mythic Quest team as they navigate a changing videogame landscape and figure out a better work-life balance.

news.title: Ubisoft Appoints Sébastien Froidefond as New Chief People Officer
news.description: With 30 years of experience in HR leadership at some of the world’s top companies, Froidefond will lead Ubisoft’s global people strategy.

news.title: Assassins’ Creed Mirage is Now Enhanced for PlayStation Pro – Here’s What to Expect
news.description: Learn how Basim's adventure through ninth-century Baghdad is optimized for PS5 Pro.

news.title: Discover Assassin’s Creed Unity’s Full-Scale Paris Map with Ubisoft+
news.description: Subscribe today to start exploring 18th-century Paris as the graceful Assassin Arno Dorian and begin uncovering the secrets of the city’s rich history.

news.title: The Division 2 Free Weekend Shines Spotlight on New Seasonal Progression System
news.description: Year 6 Season 2 – Shades of Red – reworks manhunts, seasonal journey, modifiers, and more with a host of new ways to unlock rewards; play free now through November 4.

news.title: How Prince of Persia Made its Double Comeback in 2024
news.description: Following 14 years of relative quiet, Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown and The Rogue Prince of Persia resurrected the franchise in time for its 35th anniversary. Find out more about how they came together behind the scenes.

news.title: How The Crew Keeps Growing
news.description: As the development team looks at what’s coming in The Crew Motorfest Year 2, they reflect on the community that helped make the franchise what it is today.

news.title: Destiny and For Honor Join Forces In New Halloween Event
news.description: The limited-time Light of the Guardians event adds a spooky event, Destiny-themed items, and more.

news.title: How Just Dance 2025 Edition Raises ADHD Awareness
news.description: Music meets neurodiversity in this bespoke map that takes players on a journey through having attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder.

news.title: Unlock 50-Plus Rainbow Six Siege Operators Instantly With Ubisoft+ Premium
news.description: Get access to the Ultimate Edition with every Operator from Years 1-8 of the crossplay-enabled tactical shooter (plus the base game and Disruptor Pack), all included with a subscription.

news.title: How Prince of Persia Split the Timeline
news.description: Find out how the dawn of new hardware led to the creation of an all-new Prince in 2008 – and one more Sands of Time adventure with 2010’s The Forgotten Sands.

news.title: Rainbow Six Siege Doktor’s Curse Event Returns for Halloween
news.description: New Hunters Zofia and Deimos and new Monster Fenrir join the hide-and-seek game mode set in a creepy night version of the Theme Park map.

news.title: XDefiant Air & Space Map, Stellar Strike Event Launch October 17
news.description: The new Air & Space map provides perfect sniper sightlines, twisty corners for close-range gameplay, and aliens and astronauts to watch the fast-paced action unfold.

news.title: Just Dance 2025 Edition & Just Dance VR: Welcome to Dancity Available Now
news.description: Check out the full Just Dance 2025 song list and find out more about dancing in VR with Meta Quest headsets.

news.title: Ubisoft+ Classics: Upcoming Releases and Old Favorites
news.description: Ghost Recon Wildlands, Rabbids: Party of Legends, and Hungry Shark World coming to Ubisoft+ Classics for PC.

news.title: Get the XDefiant Battle Pass With Ubisoft+ Premium
news.description: Unlock the Highwaymen, exclusive cosmetics, and more with XDefiant’s Season 2 premium Battle Pass.

news.title: Prince of Persia – Creating The Sands of Time Trilogy
news.description: Key developers behind the wall-running, time-rewinding trilogy offer a behind-the-scenes look at Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time, Warrior Within, and The Two Thrones.

news.title: Star Wars Outlaws™ - Become the Galaxy's Greatest Scoundrel on Ubisoft+
news.description: Discover the thrill of double-crossing syndicates, raiding imperials, and jumping into the pilot's seat in this galactic adventure, available now on Ubisoft's subscription service.

news.title: Prince of Persia 35th Anniversary - A Look Back at the Original Game
news.description: Series creator Jordan Mechner and others share stories from the creation of 1989's Prince of Persia and what it means to them.

news.title: Just Dance’s New Music Packs Out Now
news.description: From Disney songs to pop anthems, these themed collections let players expand and personalize their song libraries.
